The Fox Chapel Area School District has received word of another threat today, November 11, that came through Safe2Say Something shortly after 6 a.m. once again, pertaining to the high school.

Similar to the other threats, it was very vague in nature. This indirect threat was investigated as quickly as possible and was deemed not credible.

We will not be canceling school today, but we want parents to be aware of this threat.

We do not want to continue to disrupt the educational process for threats that are not credible.

The school district certainly does not take non-credible threats lightly, and our local law enforcement and our own police force are continuing to investigate this threat and the past threats in an effort to find the perpetrators of these non-credible threats.

There will continue to be additional security procedures and personnel at the high school.
